video.title: Ally McBeal
video.synopsis: Ally McBeal, an unlucky-in-love attorney, takes on peculiar cases while resisting feelings for her ex-boyfriend, who still works at her firm.

episodes.synopsis: Young lawyer Ally McBeal experiences emotional turmoil when she takes a job at a firm where her childhood sweetheart and first love also works.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Ally defends the firm's other partner on charges of soliciting a prostitute -- and feels like one when Fish asks her to date a prospective client.
episodes.title: Compromising Positions

episodes.synopsis: Ally has a confusing first date with a client and teams up with Georgia to represent an anchorwoman who was fired because of her age and sex.
episodes.title: The Kiss

episodes.synopsis: The widow of Ally's former law professor asks Ally to speak at his funeral, not knowing she once had an affair with him.
episodes.title: The Affair

episodes.synopsis: Ally is arrested for tripping a woman in a supermarket, then faces a Bar Association hearing on her emotional competence to practice law.
episodes.title: One Hundred Tears Away

episodes.synopsis: Ally saves an obese man's life, only to become the object of his affection.
episodes.title: The Promise

episodes.synopsis: Ally clashes with a client's rabbi and dates a handsome district attorney while Georgia considers suing her law firm for sex discrimination.
episodes.title: The Attitude

episodes.synopsis: The wife of a rich man negates a prenuptial agreement. Elaine's sexual harassment complaint comes to a head. Ally and Billy work on their friendship.
episodes.title: Drawing the Lines

episodes.synopsis: The delivery girl sues the firm for sexual harassment. Ally tries to prove she's no goody two-shoes by learning how to appreciate a dirty joke.
episodes.title: The Dirty Joke

episodes.synopsis: Ally defends and befriends a young transvestite prostitute. Fish sues for the right to discuss his dead uncle's prejudices. Cage ponders dating Ally.
episodes.title: Boy to the World

episodes.synopsis: A case involving a man with two wives causes Ally to examine her relationships. Fish deals with Whipper's holiday marriage blues. Cage asks Ally out.
episodes.title: Silver Bells

episodes.synopsis: Ally dates a male art model with one large attribute, fights a sexual attraction to a 19-year-old and is haunted by hallucinations of a dancing baby.
episodes.title: Cro-Magnon

episodes.synopsis: As Ally, Cage and Georgia try a case about an airplane crash, Ally is reunited with Glenn, who makes her feel guilty about using him as a sex object.
episodes.title: The Blame Game

episodes.synopsis: Ally tries to convince a prison superintendent that an inmate should be allowed to marry. Whipper breaks up with Fish. Cage undergoes "smile therapy."
episodes.title: Body Language

episodes.synopsis: An artist who can't forget his dead wife conjures up ghosts of once-in-a-lifetime love for Ally. Cage worries about kissing Ally on their date.
episodes.title: Once in a Lifetime

episodes.synopsis: A U.S. Senator is accused of breaking up his wife's former marriage. Ally's arguments about true love get her into trouble with Georgia and Billy.
episodes.title: Forbidden Fruits

episodes.synopsis: Ally defends a doctor accused of transplanting a pig's liver into a woman without her permission. Ally and Georgia kickbox. Whipper dumps Fish.
episodes.title: Theme of Life

episodes.synopsis: Ally faces off against a child prodigy attorney. A woman claims harassment because she refused to use sex as a means of advancing her career.
episodes.title: The Playing Field

episodes.synopsis: Ally is mortified when her friends throw her a surprise birthday party. A man with a foot fetish refuses to use insanity as a defense.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday Baby

episodes.synopsis: The firm teams with Bobby Donnell when a client's accused of murder. Renee's arrested for assault. A waiter alleges he was fired because he isn't gay.
episodes.title: The Inmates

episodes.synopsis: Cage defends Renee against assault charges; a home pregnancy test reveals that Georgia is pregnant.
episodes.title: Being There

episodes.synopsis: Cage defends a longtime convict who used a trampoline to break out of prison. A woman sues her ex-fiancé for leaving her at the altar.
episodes.title: Alone Again

episodes.synopsis: Bobby Donnell asks for the firm's help when two men seek an operation to switch hearts. Cage's cousin is arrested for assaulting people with a paddle.
episodes.title: These Are the Days

episodes.synopsis: Ally finds herself attracted to an 18-year-old; Cage considers hiring an attorney he finds attractive.
episodes.title: The Real World

episodes.synopsis: A client sues a radio shock-jock for contributing to sexual harassment at her workplace; Cage defends a restaurateur who fed a customer horsemeat.
episodes.title: They Eat Horses, Don't They

episodes.synopsis: A minister breaks up with his church's choir singer. A client sues a plastic surgeon's nurse for misrepresenting her natural breasts as implants.
episodes.title: Fool's Night Out

episodes.synopsis: A judge holds Ally in contempt for wearing short skirts in court. An editor for a feminist magazine is fired for being of the Baptist faith.
episodes.title: It's My Party

episodes.synopsis: Ally defends a woman who threw her best friend into a garbage canister after learning she stole her boyfriend. An accident befalls Cage's frog.
episodes.title: Story of Love

episodes.synopsis: A nun sues for damages after she is fired for breaking her vow of celibacy; Cage's once-thought-dead frog reappears.
episodes.title: Worlds Without Love

episodes.synopsis: Judge Boyle passes away. A woman sues her employer. Elaine urges Ally to give an unwanted suitor "the dump." More bad luck hits Stefan the frog.
episodes.title: Happy Trails

episodes.synopsis: Cage and Fish go undercover at Ling's mud-wrestling club. Ally gets stuck in the unisex toilet. Georgia is attracted to a man she once dated.
episodes.title: Just Looking

episodes.synopsis: As Thanksgiving approaches, Ling sues an employee for having sexual thoughts about her; Ally goes to court with her fingers stuck in a bowling ball.
episodes.title: You Never Can Tell

episodes.synopsis: As Christmas approaches, Fish's biggest client is fired from his job after he sees a unicorn; Renee and Matt's relationship heats up.
episodes.title: Making Spirits Bright

episodes.synopsis: An ailing woman seeks a court order that would force a hospital to place her in a coma. Nelle has tired of Cage's lack of sexual aggressiveness.
episodes.title: In Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Ally represents a woman whose husband wishes to annul their marriage because he is a "sexaholic," though he agreed to go through with the wedding.
episodes.title: Love Unlimited

episodes.synopsis: A young leukemia sufferer wishes to sue God; Fish and Cage defend a client accused of attempted murder.
episodes.title: Angels and Blimps

episodes.synopsis: A company fires two employees for breaking its dating office policy. Billy is jealous of Greg and Ally. Ling asks Fish to hire her as counsel.
episodes.title: Pyramids on the Nile

episodes.synopsis: Ally consults Tracy for advice now that she and Billy have kissed.
episodes.title: Side Show

episodes.synopsis: A bookstore owner is driven out of business by a politician who claims he sold pornography. Ally and Billy deal with the aftermath of their kiss.
episodes.title: Sex, Lies & Politics

episodes.synopsis: Ally and Cage face Fish and Georgia when the firm represents both sides of a date rape case. Nelle represents a client in trouble with the IRS.
episodes.title: Civil Wars

episodes.synopsis: Ally defends a man accused of murdering his wife. Billy and Georgia represent a life insurance salesman who lost his job because of his bad comb-over.
episodes.title: Those Lips, That Hand

episodes.synopsis: A law firm withheld a female employee's partnership after she became pregnant. Ling substitutes in a dance contest. Billy and Georgia attend therapy.
episodes.title: Let's Dance

episodes.synopsis: An overweight woman claims allowing workers to wear bathing suits to work amounts to sexual harassment. Elaine is accused of stealing an idea.
episodes.title: Only the Lonely

episodes.synopsis: Ally hopes to make Greg jealous. Fish and Cage represent a woman who destroyed her husband's possessions. Billy objects to Georgia's revealing attire.
episodes.title: The Green Monster

episodes.synopsis: Ally's fantasies interfere with her lawyering. A man who believes his wife never loved him sues. Fish and Ling are about to make love.
episodes.title: Love's Illusions

episodes.synopsis: Ally takes a more aggressive approach in dating. A lesbian who wants to have a baby sues her insurance company when it refuses to cover the process.
episodes.title: I Know Him by Heart

episodes.synopsis: Ally has sex with a stranger inside a car wash. A bride is caught cheating on her fiancé. Renee launches her own law practice.
episodes.title: Car Wash

episodes.synopsis: Ling has a dream about kissing Ally. Billy and Renee defend a woman sued for being too sexy. Cage believes that Nelle enjoys being spanked.
episodes.title: Buried Pleasures

episodes.synopsis: Ally takes medication to end her hallucinations. A student is suspended from school after he kisses a co-ed. Billy attends a male sensitivity class.
episodes.title: Seeing Green

episodes.synopsis: Risa Helms sues Ally for inflicting emotional distress. Georgia expresses outrage at Billy's new assistant. Ling tells Fish she's been faking in bed.
episodes.title: Heat Wave

episodes.synopsis: Ally's Thanksgiving turns into a debacle when she invites her colleagues and her parents to her apartment for dinner.
episodes.title: Troubled Water

episodes.synopsis: A woman claims her employees sexually harassed her after she slept with her boss and, despite her lack of experience, became editor-in-chief.
episodes.title: Changes

episodes.synopsis: Cage faces off against Georgia when a department store Santa claims he was fired because he is too fat.
episodes.title: Saving Santa

episodes.synopsis: As Christmas approaches, Elaine attempts to gain custody of an infant she found in a nativity scene.
episodes.title: Blue Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Ally befriends a homeless man who shares many of her idiosyncrasies; Ling is arrested for running an escort service for underage boys.
episodes.title: Out in the Cold

episodes.synopsis: Ally experiences a dream in which Cage is "the one"; Elaine's blind date turns into a debacle.
episodes.title: Just Friends

episodes.synopsis: Georgia sues the law firm for breaking up her marriage.
episodes.title: Over the Rainbow

episodes.synopsis: On Valentine's Day Ally intentionally rear-ends a handsome driver; Ling comes to the aid of an elderly man facing eviction from a nursing home.
episodes.title: In Search of Pygmies

episodes.synopsis: Ally rebuffs the advances of a coffee shop worker. A man attempts to annul his marriage. Billy tells Sandy about his feelings for her.
episodes.title: Pursuit of Loneliness

episodes.synopsis: Ally and Elaine try become Tina Turner's backup singer. Cage and Fish represent a group of misfits who were fired because of their appearance.
episodes.title: The Oddball Parade

episodes.synopsis: The attorneys defend Paul Potts when he is accused of murdering his former boss; Billy seeks professional help when he begins hallucinating.
episodes.title: Prime Suspect

episodes.synopsis: Billy starts having hallucinations. A man claims that his wife's cosmetic surgery is grounds for an annulment. Cage gets stuck in an elevator.
episodes.title: Boy Next Door

episodes.synopsis: Fish hires attorney Mark Albert as Billy's replacement; the lawyers defend a woman accused of beating her husband to death with his prosthetic leg.
episodes.title: I Will Survive

episodes.synopsis: Ally faces turning 30; the attorneys defend a well-endowed woman accused of smothering her elderly husband with her breasts.
episodes.title: Turning Thirty

episodes.synopsis: After having cybersex with a stranger she met online, Ally arranges to meet her "lover." A man sues his best friend for sleeping with his wife.
episodes.title: Do You Wanna Dance

episodes.synopsis: Nelle tricks Elaine into quitting the firm so she can access important clients' files. Ally and Brian Selig's relationship heats up.
episodes.title: Hope and Glory

episodes.synopsis: Ally introduces her parents to Brian Selig; Nelle asks Fish and Cage if they will take her back; Cage celebrates a birthday.
episodes.title: Ally McBeal: The Musical, Almost

episodes.synopsis: Ally develops cold feet when Selig asks her to move in with him. A client seeks an annulment instead of a divorce when her husband cheats on her.
episodes.title: Sex, Lies and Second Thoughts

episodes.synopsis: Ally cleverly stages a way for her and her friends to meet desirable men at the bar.
episodes.title: Girls Night Out

episodes.synopsis: Ally falls for two men. Fish considers telling Mark about Cindy. A client claims she lost her husband after a guru encouraged her to be submissive.
episodes.title: Two's a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: A woman sues for defamation after Ally makes remarks in front of her friends. Mark makes a final decision regarding his relationship to Cindy.
episodes.title: Without a Net

episodes.synopsis: Ally, who fears she may have forgotten how to kiss, battles Larry Paul in court when Kimmy sues her former law firm.
episodes.title: The Last Virgin

episodes.synopsis: The firm represents a newscaster who exposed the truth about Santa. Ally learns why Larry hates Christmas. Cage attempts to impress Kimmy.
episodes.title: 'Tis the Season

episodes.synopsis: A former employee sues Elaine for sexual harassment; a gay man wins a date with Fish during a charity auction; Nelle dates a man with a secret.
episodes.title: Love on Holiday

episodes.synopsis: Larry receives a visit from his ex-girlfriend. Nelle's father, who believes he is Santa Claus, sues his former employer for wrongful termination.
episodes.title: The Man with the Bag

episodes.synopsis: Cage defends a Tourette's syndrome sufferer accused of running over her lover. An elderly woman fears her attorney husband will never retire and sues.
episodes.title: Reasons to Believe

episodes.synopsis: Larry's girlfriend wants to move to Canada. Melanie is fired from her job. A bride-to-be asks Ling to make advances on her fiance to test him.
episodes.title: The Ex Files

episodes.synopsis: Ally represents a woman who fired an employee for being overweight. Cage fears he's being stalked by a transient. Elaine hopes to win a dance contest.
episodes.title: Mr. Bo

episodes.synopsis: A dance instructor claims his former partner stole his dance moves. Larry's son attempts to sue his estranged parents. Cindy attempts to wed a man.
episodes.title: Hats Off to Larry

episodes.synopsis: A man wed to a nymphomaniac seeks to annul the marriage. Ally has visions of Barry Manilow. Cage proposes to Melanie. Jackson Duper joins the firm.
episodes.title: Reach Out and Touch

episodes.synopsis: The firm defends a female attorney who fired all her male workers; Fish and Cage attend couples therapy after a dispute erupts over a baseball glove.
episodes.title: Boystown

episodes.synopsis: A man seeks an annulment after his wife changes her mind about having children. Ally seeks therapy when she experiences fantasies about Larry.
episodes.title: Falling Up

episodes.synopsis: Fish and Cage travel to Los Angeles for a much-needed getaway, where they become involved in the lives of two women.
episodes.title: The Getaway

episodes.synopsis: A couple experiences turmoil when their attorneys bicker over a prenuptial agreement. A man attempts to have his happy father declared incompetent.
episodes.title: The Pursuit of Unhappiness

episodes.synopsis: A woman sues for fraud after she falls in love with a man online only to discover he is a little person; a man is sued for ruining a wedding.
episodes.title: The Obstacle Course

episodes.synopsis: Cage faces off against Larry when he represents a man seeking to clone his dead wife.
episodes.title: In Search of Barry White

episodes.synopsis: A man sues rock star Sting for ruining his marriage; a Barbra Streisand impersonator sues a plastic surgeon for making his nose too big.
episodes.title: Cloudy Skies, Chance of Parade

episodes.synopsis: Fish and Cage represent a woman with incredible power over men. Nelle and Jackson attempt to diffuse a feud before it sparks a sexual harassment case.
episodes.title: Queen Bee

episodes.synopsis: Ally and Larry break up. In Los Angeles, Fish handles a contract case involving the publishing of nude photos and gets some help from Cage in Boston.
episodes.title: Home Again

episodes.synopsis: Ally represents a shy boy devastated by the rejection of his would-be prom date. Fish develops concerns over the firm's apparent lack of compassion.
episodes.title: The Wedding

episodes.synopsis: The firm hires attorneys Jenny Shaw and Glenn Foy. Shaw sues all the telephone companies for solicitation calls. Cage believes Ally loves him.
episodes.title: Friends and Lovers

episodes.synopsis: The plaintiff in the telephone solicitation case is a man in drag. Ling is a judge in small claims court. Coretta convinces Cage to have a makeover.
episodes.title: Judge Ling

episodes.synopsis: The attorneys develop a novel approach to gain leverage against the telephone companies; Cage expresses his feelings for Ally.
episodes.title: Neutral Corners

episodes.synopsis: Jenny represents Raymond in a sexual harassment case. Raymond expresses an interest in dating Jenny, and Glenn expresses an interest in dating Ally.
episodes.title: Fear of Flirting

episodes.synopsis: Jenny's mother, who is marrying a 22-year-old man, sues her former employers for sexual harassment; Elton John sings at the bar.
episodes.title: I Want Love

episodes.synopsis: Ally, Glenn, Raymond and Jenny go out on a double date.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: A minister loses his job because he no longer believes in God. A town mayor cancels Christmas celebrations. A woman sues for sexual harassment.
episodes.title: Nine One One

episodes.synopsis: Frances's fiancé hits on Ally. Kimmy sues a matchmaker after she spends money and fails to find a man. Ally encounters the ghost of a young boy.
episodes.title: Playing with Matches

episodes.synopsis: Ally falls in love with a dumpy house. A woman sues after her ex-husband goes bankrupt. Jenny's chiropractor's chair proves sexually fulfilling.
episodes.title: Blowin' in the Wind

episodes.synopsis: Ally aids a man determined to make a dream come true by flying across a river using a pair of wings. A matchmaker sets up Elaine and Fish on dates.
episodes.title: One Hundred Tears

episodes.synopsis: A little girl claims she is Ally's daughter; Fish and Cage take on their first murder trial, defending a man accused of kicking his wife in the head.
episodes.title: A Kick in the Head

episodes.synopsis: Fish offers to make Ally a partner. A woman with AIDS sues after she's fired from a law firm. Ally adjusts to her new life as a parent.
episodes.title: The New Day

episodes.synopsis: Ally fires two employees. Claire is accused of sexually harassing co-workers. Nelle and Ling sing together at the bar. Maddie has a slumber party.
episodes.title: Woman

episodes.synopsis: Ally wants to determine if Maddie is her daughter. A woman mistakes Victor for her lover. Claire arranges a meeting between Fish and his first love.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Ally does some soul searching after she asks Victor on a date. Fish, Raymond and Claire represent a woman seeking a heart transplant from her father.
episodes.title: Heart and Soul

episodes.synopsis: Ally gets nervous as her third date with Victor approaches. Claire announces her engagement and puts together a prenuptial agreement.
episodes.title: Love Is All Around

episodes.synopsis: Liza and Cage defend a woman charged with bigamy. Nelle and a new associate, Wilson Jade, represent a woman suing her husband for sexual harassment.
episodes.title: Tom Dooley

episodes.synopsis: Ally represents Victor when he's sued by an ex-girlfriend and discovers that Victor created a painting of her -- complete with cellulite.
episodes.title: Another One Bites the Dust

episodes.synopsis: When Fish's father is sued for harassment, Fish's mother asks for a divorce. Elaine tries out for a role in "A Chorus Line." Fish is drawn to Liza.
episodes.title: Reality Bites

episodes.synopsis: The attorneys represent a woman with a split personality: Helen, who's in love with her husband, and the aggressive Helena, who wants a divorce.
episodes.title: All of Me

episodes.synopsis: When Maddie suffers a nervous breakdown, Ally decides to move to New York, leading to tearful goodbyes with her friends; Fish and Liza decide to wed.
episodes.title: Bygones
